summary: An archaeologist opens an Egyptian tomb and accidentally releases an evil spirit. His young daughter becomes possessed by the freed entity and, upon arrival back in New York, the gory murders begin.
cast: Christopher Connelly|Laura Lenzi|Brigitta Boccoli|Giovanni Frezza|Cinzia de Ponti|Cosimo Cinieri|Andrea Bosic|Carlo De Mejo|Enzo Marino Bellanich|Mario Moretti|Lucio Fulci|Tonino Pulci|Martin Sorrentino
title: Manhattan Baby
